enchantment.flaming.name: Flaming
enchantment.freezing.name: Freezing
enchantment.shocking.name: Shocking
enchantment.riposte.name: Riposte
enchantment.riposte.description: [key.trigger.on_parry][key.style.break_small]Your [key.flavour.important](first) attack in the next [key.variable.static](3) seconds has [key.variable.positive]({0:+0%;-0%;0%}) [key.stat.attack.speed].
enchantment.frenzy.name: Frenzy
enchantment.frenzy.description:
[key.trigger.on_hit][key.style.break_small]Gain [key.variable.positive]({0:+0%;-0%;0%}) [key.stat.attack.speed] and [key.variable.positive]({1:+0%;-0%;0%}) [key.stat.movement.speed] for [key.variable.static](4) seconds.
[key.mechanic.stacks] up to [key.variable.static](3) times.
enchantment.double_strike.name: Double Strike
enchantment.double_strike.description: After a successful hit, there is a {0} chance the target is hit again for {1} damage after a short delay.
enchantment.barbed.name: Barbed
enchantment.barbed.description: [key.trigger.on_block][key.style.break_small]If the [key.mechanic.block](Blocked) attack was a [key.flag.melee] attack, inflict [key.variable.positive]({0:F0}) [key.status.bleed] on the attacker.[key.style.break_small][key.flavour.reminder](This will also trigger on Parries).
